verses.roman:
dakṣiṇo vinayī hrīmān
śaraṇāgata-pālakaḥ
sukhī bhakta-suhṛt prema-
vaśyaḥ sarva-śubhaṅkaraḥ

synonyms: dakṣiṇaḥ—simple and liberal; vinayī—humble; hrīmān—bashful when glorified; śaraṇāgata-pālakaḥ—protector of the surrendered soul; sukhī—always happy; bhakta-suhṛt—well-wisher of the devotees; prema-vaśyaḥ—submissive to love; sarva-śubhaṅkaraḥ—all-auspicious.
translation: " 'Kṛṣṇa is very simple and liberal, He is humble and bashful, and He is the protector of the surrendered soul. He is very happy, and He is always the well-wisher of His devotee. He is all-auspicious, and He is submissive to love.
